alert.note: Alert for Door; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 15 at 11:04AM CST until November 16 at 4:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW EXPECTED OVER NORTHEAST WISCONSIN TONIGHT... .An upper level disturbance will produce light snow across the area through the afternoon hours. Then a band of lake effect snow will move south across the region tonight and bring a period of moderate to heavy snow. Two to four inches are expected in most places. Local amounts to six inches are possible. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. It could be briefly mixed with rain near the bay and lake shores. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Door, Northern Marinette County, Northern Oconto County, Southern Marinette County, and Southern Oconto County Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 4 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Door; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
